sourcesContent:
<script>
    export default {
      name: "HomePage",
      metaInfo: {
        // if no subcomponents specify a metaInfo.title, this title will be used
        title: "Home | QwikTime"
      },
      data: () => ({
        //side bar
        drawer: false,
        group: null,
        selectedItem: 0,

        images: [
          {
            src: 'https://media.glassdoor.com/l/41/b2/48/78/development-delivery-office.jpg',
          },
          {
            src: 'https://media.glassdoor.com/l/61/3f/74/20/celebrating-festival-of-colors.jpg',
          },
          {
            src: 'https://cdn.vuetifyjs.com/images/carousel/bird.jpg',
          },
          {
            src: 'https://cdn.vuetifyjs.com/images/carousel/planet.jpg',
          },
        ],
      }),
      methods: {
        
      }
    }
  </script>
  
  <template>
    <!-- App.vue -->

    <v-app-bar
      color="deep-purple"
      dark
    >
      <v-app-bar-nav-icon @click="drawer = !drawer"></v-app-bar-nav-icon>

      <v-toolbar-title>
        <v-img class="app-title" src="../assets/qwiktime.png"/>
      </v-toolbar-title>
    </v-app-bar>

    <v-navigation-drawer
      v-model="drawer"
      absolute
      temporary
    >

      <v-list
        nav
        dense
      >
        
        <v-list-item-content class="list-item-content">
          <v-list-item-title class="text-h6">
            John Leider
          </v-list-item-title>
          <v-list-item-subtitle>john@vuetifyjs.com</v-list-item-subtitle>
        </v-list-item-content>
        
        <v-list-item-group class="list-item-group"
          v-model="selectedItem"
          color="primary"
        >

          <v-subheader>COMMON</v-subheader>

          <v-list-item class="list-item">
            <v-list-item-icon>
              <v-icon>mdi-home</v-icon>
            </v-list-item-icon>
            <v-list-item-title class="list-text">Home</v-list-item-title>
          </v-list-item>

          <v-subheader>MASTERS</v-subheader>

          <v-list-item class="list-item">
            <v-list-item-icon>
              <v-icon>mdi-account</v-icon>
            </v-list-item-icon>
            <v-list-item-title class="list-text">Customers</v-list-item-title>
          </v-list-item>
        </v-list-item-group>
      </v-list>
    </v-navigation-drawer>

    <v-container fluid>
      <v-row>
        <v-col lg="6" md="6" sm="6" xs="12">
          <v-card>
            <v-carousel hide-delimiters>
              <v-carousel-item
                v-for="(item,i) in images"
                :key="i"
                :src="item.src"
              ></v-carousel-item>
          </v-carousel>
          </v-card>
        </v-col>

        <v-col lg="3" md="3" sm="6" xs="12">
          <v-card>
            <v-card-title>
              Notifications
            </v-card-title>
            <v-card-text>
              This card will always be 16:9 (unless you put more stuff in it)
            </v-card-text>
          </v-card>
        </v-col>

        <v-col lg="3" md="3" sm="6" xs="12">
          <v-card>
            <v-card-title>
              Events
            </v-card-title>
            <v-card-text>
              This card will always be 16:9 (unless you put more stuff in it)
            </v-card-text>
          </v-card>
        </v-col>
        
      </v-row>
    </v-container>
  </template>
  
  <style>
    .app-title{
      width: 100px;
    }

    .list-item-content {
      padding: 10px 0px 20px 0px !important;
    }

    .list-item-group{
      margin-top: 30px !important;
    }
  
    .list-item{
      cursor: pointer;
    }

    .list-item:hover{
      background-color: #eadeff;
    }

    .list-text{
      display: inline-flex;
      margin-left: 20px;
    }
  </style>
